long_description: con tan sólo 17 años, josé vázquez (jose sin tilde, para todos) compaginaba sus estudios con el trabajo, ayudando a su padre jesús vázquez en su nueva empresa j. vazquez,sl que era heredera en galicia de la antigua y mítica gispert a nivel nacional. jose, técnico superior en electrónica e. los programas que comercializamos están adaptados a la ley antifraude leer más. desde 1998, desde vigo, a la vanguardia. cajas registradoras + tpv táctil + balanzas 26 años a tú.
generated_description: regisbal is a company based in pontevedra, galicia, specializing in the sale and service of point-of-sale (pos) terminals, electronic scales, barcode readers, and other related equipment. founded by josé vázquez, a technician with over 35 years of experience in electronics and informatics, regisbal has grown to serve more than 2,000 clients, including over 1,000 active clients across galicia. the company has navigated significant challenges such as the introduction of the euro in 2002 and the economic crisis of 2007, while continuing to face new challenges with optimism.
generated_business_tags: ticket printing | touch pos systems | fake bill detectors | uninterruptible power supplies | software solutions | bar code readers | technical services | cash registers | anti-fraud compliance | pc-based point of sale terminals | smart recorders | balance sheets
